title: S3 - Lambda - Transcribe
description: Trigger a Transcribe job from an S3 upload.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern contains a Lambda Function with an S3 object trigger to start an Amazon Transcribe job and place the transcription results into a seperate S3 bucket.
This pattern deploys one Lambda Function and two S3 Buckets.
